text: "Somewhere Out There" is a 1986 song by Linda Ronstadt and James Ingram. It was taken from the 1986 movie An American Tail. It went to number 2 in both the United States and Canada, number 8 in the United Kingdom, number 6 in Ireland, number 31 in Australia and number 15 in Sweden. It won 2 Grammy Awards in 1988. Category:1986 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Linda Ronstadt songs Category:James Ingram songs Category:Grammy Award-winning songs
title: Somewhere Out There (An American Tail song)
